simple_summary.description: Generate a concise summary of the text using a simple prompt.

detailed_summary.description: Generate a detailed summary including titles, tags, entities, and main arguments.
detailed_summary.prompt: TASK: TL;DR/SUMMARY of TEXT in JSON. JSON keys: 'titles' (array of strings): 2-5 appropriate titles for TEXT; 'tags' (string): tag cloud; 'entities' (array of {'name', 'description'} objects): named entities, including persons, organizations, processes, etc., their detailed description and relationships; 'short_summaries' (array of strings): one-two sentence summaries of TEXT; 'style' (string): type, sentiment and writing style of TEXT; 'arguments' (array of strings): 5-10 main arguments of TEXT; 'summary' (string): detailed summary of TEXT.

short_summary.description: Generate a concise one-paragraph summary of the text.
short_summary.prompt: TASK: Provide a concise one-paragraph summary of TEXT.

titles_and_tags.description: Generate possible titles and tags for the text.
titles_and_tags.prompt: TASK: Generate 2-5 possible titles for TEXT and suggest a tag cloud based on the content.

entities_overview.description: Identify and describe named entities within the text.
entities_overview.prompt: TASK: Identify and provide a brief description of named entities (persons, organizations, processes, relationships between) within TEXT.
